attributes.action: Turning Lulworth House Cheadle into a registrars office  and community rooms, following on from Pugins Festival
attributes.additional_details:
Change of use of Lulworth House in Cheadle High street (the old Police Station) into a registry office for the people of the town.
We are severely limited in this area and costs of many places are just mad!
The building has a fantasic view and if the gardens at front were to prettied then it would be easy, as the building has been done for the Pugin Festival. At other times, the rooms could be used by other local groups.

rejection.details: The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The matter that you have raised is one for the local authorities in your area.
